statements: UPDATE influencer_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, engagement_rate = 0.6 WHERE influencer_id = 101;
UPDATE influencer_sentiment_analysis SET comment_text = 'Great post!', engagement_rate = 0.7, sentiment_score = 0.9 WHERE influencer_name = 'Emily';
UPDATE influencer_sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 4.5, engagement_rate = 9.8 WHERE influencer_id = 123 AND influencer_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE influencer_sentiment_analysis SET engagement_rate = 7.2, sentiment_score = 3.7, comment_text = 'Great post!' WHERE influencer_id = 456 AND influencer_name = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = 5000 WHERE id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4d00';
UPDATE comments SET sentiment_label = 'Positive', comment_text = 'Great post! Keep it up!' WHERE influencer_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4d00';
UPDATE influencers SET followers_count = followers_count + 1000, engagement_rate = 5.55 WHERE id = '3e535db5-5f4c-4d5f-81ac-c65ff2a2ab35';
UPDATE comments SET sentiment_label = 'Positive', comment_text = 'Great post!' WHERE influencer_id = '3e535db5-5f4c-4d5f-81ac-c65ff2a2ab35' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE influencer_comments SET sentiment_score = 4.5 WHERE influencer_id = 1234;
UPDATE influencer_profiles SET bio_text = 'Passionate about travel and adventure' WHERE influencer_id = 5678;
UPDATE influencer_comments SET comment_text = 'Updated Comment Text' WHERE comment_id = 123 AND influencer_id = 456;
UPDATE influencer_engagement SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, shares_count = shares_count - 2 WHERE engagement_id = 789 AND influencer_id = 101112;
UPDATE influencer_profiles SET followers_count = 10000 WHERE influencer_id = 1;
UPDATE influencer_comments SET sentiment_score = 5, created_at = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE comment_id = 3;
UPDATE influencer_profiles SET followers_count = 15000, category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = 10;
UPDATE influencer_comments SET sentiment_score = 4, created_at = '2022-01-15 09:30:00' WHERE comment_id = 25;
UPDATE Influencers SET influencer_category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE AudienceMetrics SET followers_count = 20000, engagement_rate = 0.05 WHERE influencer_id = 1;

UPDATE Influencers SET influencer_category = 'Fashion' WHERE influencer_id = 1;

UPDATE AudienceMetrics SET engagement_rate = 0.034 WHERE influencer_id = 3;
